page.title: 02BLACKBURN TOWN CENTRE
page.content: Blackburn town centre is very large. It has many shops and banks. Most of the shops are large department stores and clothes shops. Many shops are situated in a modern precinct built and owned by{LAINGS.}These shops range from hardware to hairdressers, butchers to boutiques. Big department stores like Woolworths and Debenhams take up most of the space. Blackburn's new Town Hall is also in the precinct but the old Town Hall is just outside it. Around the precinct are many small shops, banks and building societies. Above the precinct is a multi-storey car park with a capacity of{1390}cars. One attraction to outsiders is { {Tommy Ball's}shoe market. People come from all over Britain to buy cheap Clarks, Kays and Italian shoes.
